Esther Sleepe (1725-1762), bụ onye ọchụnta ego ndị bekee.

A mụrụ ya na Richard Sleepe, Onye isi nke City Waits (d.1758) na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Esther Dubois (1693-1773), na nwanne nwanyị Mary Sleepe Samson na Martha Sleepe.
N'afọ 1749 ọ lụrụ onye egwu Charles Burney wee bụrụ nne Charles Burney na Fanny Burney.

Site na 1747, ụmụnna nwanyị na-ehi ụra jisiri ike ogbako nke ha, The Golden Fan & Seven Stars na London, ebe ha rụpụtara ma na-ere ndị fan na ihe ndị ọzọ okomoko.  Ha nwere ihe ịga nke ọma.  Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ya gasịrị, Esther Sleepe bụ onye na-akwado ezinụlọ ya n'ụzọ ego, ebe ọ bụ na a na-akwụ ụgwọ ọrụ nke onye òtù ọlụlụ ya, ma eziokwu a zoro ezo mgbe ọgbọ ya gasịrị, ebe ọ bụ na ezinụlọ Burney nwere ọchịchọ ka a hụ ya dị ka ọkwa elu, ebe ọ bụ.  Ahụghị ka ọ dị mma maka nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ọkachamara.
A na-echekwa otu n'ime kaadị azụmahịa ya na British Museum:
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọchụnta ego nọ na London na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ nke e gosipụtara na ngosi 'City Women in the 18th Century' na London 21 Septemba - 18 Ọktoba 2019.
